definitions.body: ointment, the holy oil used in the consecration of the Aaronic priests, only in P; [[שֶׁמֶן הַמִּשְׁחָה]] Ex 25:6, Ex 29:7, Ex 29:21, Ex 31:11, Ex 35:8, Ex 35:15, Ex 35:28, Ex 37:29, Ex 39:38, Ex 40:9, Le 8:2, Le 8:10, Le 8:12, Le 8:30, Le 21:10, Nu 4:16; [[מִשְׁחַת קׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[שׁ]] Ex 30:25, Ex 30:25, Ex 30:31; [[יהוה]] ´[[מ]] ´[[שׁ]] Le 10:7; [[אֱלֽהָיו]] ´[[מ]] ´[[שׁ]] Le 21:12.
consecrated portion, of Aaron and his sons Le 7:35, Le 7:35 (P).
